com.symbol.emdk

Enum EMDKManager.FEATURE_TYPE

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<EMDKManager.FEATURE_TYPE>
      • com.symbol.emdk.EMDKManager.FEATURE_TYPE
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<EMDKManager.FEATURE_TYPE>
    Enclosing class:
    EMDKManager

    public static enum EMDKManager.FEATURE_TYPE
extends Enum<EMDKManager.FEATURE_TYPE>
    This lists all the features exposed by the EMDK. 

     Example Usage:
 	FEATURE_TYPE.PROFILE

      EMDK feature type version
